properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT '{Config.sourceSystem}' AS SRC_SYS_CD
, TRIM(OPERATION.OPERATIONID) as OPR_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.ACTIONSMENUID) as ACTNS_MENU_ID
, CAST(OPERATION.ETHALLOWOPERATIONADJUSTMENT as BOOLEAN ) as ALLW_OPR_ADJ_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as ALLW_RWRK_IND
, TRIM(OPERATION.ETHALLOWEDGRADE) as ALLW_GRADE_CD
, TRIM(OPERATION.AUTOADJUSTLIMIT) as AUTO_ADJ_LMT_VAL
, TRIM(OPERATION.AUTOADJUSTREASONID) as AUTO_ADJ_RSN_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as BTCH_PRCSG_TYPE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as BTCH_TYPE_RLSE_VERIF_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.BONUSREASONSID) as BNS_RSN_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.BUYREASONSID) as BUY_RSN_ID
, INT(OPERATION.CHANGECOUNT) as CHG_CNT
, TRIM(OPERATION.CHANGESTATUSID) as CHG_STS_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as CKLST_GRP_ID
, INT(OPERATION.ETHCOMPLETIONCOUNT) as CMPLT_CNT
, TRIM(OPERATION.COMPONENTDEFECTREASONSID) as CMPNT_DEFCT_RSN_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as CNSMPTN_GRP_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.CONTAINERDEFECTREASONSID) as CNTNR_DEFCT_RSN_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.DEFAULTROLLUPREASONID) as DFLT_RLUP_RSN_ID
, INT(OPERATION.ETHDEFAULTUNITSPERBOX) as DFLT_UNIT_PER_BOX_NBR
, TRIM(OPERATION.DISPATCHRULEID) as DSPCH_RULE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as EES_OPR_TYPE_CD
, TRIM(OPERATION.ETHSUBSTITUTIONREASONID) as ETH_SUBST_RSN_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.ICONID) as ICON_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.IMAGE) as IMG_TXT
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as IN_PRCS_CKLST_RST_GRP_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as IN_PRCS_WRKF_BASE_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as IN_PRCS_WRKF_ID
, CAST(OPERATION.INTRANSIT as BOOLEAN ) as IN_TRNST_IND
, TRIM(OPERATION.INVENTORYPOINT) as INV_PT_CD
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_BK_END_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_BULK_PACK_IND
, CAST(OPERATION.ETHISFINALINVENTORYPOINT as BOOLEAN ) as IS_FNL_INV_PT_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_FRN_END_IND
, CAST(OPERATION.ISFROZEN as BOOLEAN ) as IS_FRZN_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_HEAT_SEAL_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_IN_PRCS_SPLT_OPR_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_MSTR_LOT_STGNG_OPR_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_PRE_QC_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_PROD_CONV_MULTI_STAGE_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_PROD_CONV_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_PROD_CONV_STGNG_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_QA_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_QC_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_SEC_PACK_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_SEC_PKG_STGNG_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_SPLT_INTRO_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_STGNG_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_STERI_STGNG_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_STERILIZATION_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as IS_STERILIZER_IND
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as ISS_RSN_GRP_ID
, CAST(OPERATION.ETHLIMSRELEASEREQUIRED as BOOLEAN ) as LIMS_RLSE_REQ_IND
, TRIM(OPERATION.LOCALREWORKREASONSID) as LCL_RWRK_RSN_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.LOSSREASONSID) as LOSS_RSN_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as LOT_RSN_GRP_ID
, INT(OPERATION.ETHMAXALLOWEDGRADE) as MAX_ALLW_GRADE_NBR
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as MIC_CD
, TRIM(OPERATION.NOTES) as NOTES_TXT
, TRIM(OPERATION.CDOTYPEID) as OBJ_TYPE_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.DESCRIPTION) as OPR_DESC
, TRIM(OPERATION.OPERATIONNAME) as OPR_NM
, TRIM(OPERATION.OUTSIDESERVICEPOINT) as OUTSD_SRVC_PT_CD
, TRIM(OPERATION.ETHPRINTQUEUE1ID) as PRT_QUE_1_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.ETHPRINTQUEUE2ID) as PRT_QUE_2_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.ETHPRINTQUEUE3ID) as PRT_QUE_3_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.PRINTQUEUEID) as PRT_QUE_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.QTYADJUSTREASONID) as QTY_ADJ_RSN_ID
, CAST(OPERATION.REJECTINCOMINGNCCONTAINER as BOOLEAN ) as REJ_INCM_NC_CNTNR_IND
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as RMV_RSN_GRP_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.REWORKREASONSID) as RWRK_RSN_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as SAMP_TYPE_REQ_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as SAMP_TYPE_VERIF_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.SCHEDULINGDETAILID) as SCHDLNG_DTL_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.ETHSEALINGOPERATION) as SEALING_OPR_CD
, TRIM(OPERATION.SELLREASONSID) as SEL_RSN_ID
, CAST(OPERATION.ETHSENDOPCOMPLETIONMSG as BOOLEAN ) as SEND_OP_CMPLT_MSG_IND
, TRIM(OPERATION.SHIPMENTDESTINATIONSID) as SHIP_DEST_ID
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as SUBST_RSN_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.SUMMARYTHRUPUT) as SUM_THRUPUT_VAL
, TRIM(OPERATION.THRUPUTREPORTINGLEVELID) as THRUPUT_RPTG_LVL_ID
, CAST(OPERATION.ETHTRACKAMBIENTEXPTIME as BOOLEAN ) as TRK_AMBNT_EXP_TIME_IND
, CAST(OPERATION.ETHTRACKDRYEXPTIME as BOOLEAN ) as TRK_DRY_EXP_TIME_IND
, CAST(OPERATION.ETHTRACKLIGHTEXPTIME as BOOLEAN ) as TRK_LGT_EXP_TIME_IND
, CAST(OPERATION.ETHTRACKNITROGENEXPTIME as BOOLEAN ) as TRK_NITROGEN_EXP_TIME_IND
, TRIM(OPERATION.ETHTRACKPOSTANNEALINGEXPTIME) as TRK_POST_ANNEALING_EXP_TIME_IN
, CAST(OPERATION.ETHTRACKPREANNEALINGEXPTIME as BOOLEAN ) as TRK_PRE_ANNEALING_EXP_TIME_IND
, TRIM(OPERATION.TRAININGREQGROUPID) as TRAIN_REQ_GRP_ID
, CAST(NULL AS INT) as TRNG_RCNT_EXP_DAYS_CNT
, CAST(NULL AS STRING) as TRNG_RCNT_ID
, CAST(OPERATION.USEQUEUE as BOOLEAN ) as USE_QUE_IND
, CAST(NULL AS BOOLEAN) as USE_RACK_IND
, CAST(OPERATION.ETHVALIDATESINGLESPOOLS as BOOLEAN ) as VLD_SNGL_SPOOLS_IND
, CAST(OPERATION.ETHVALIDATESPOOLS as BOOLEAN ) as VLD_SPOOLS_IND
, TRIM(OPERATION.WIPMSGDEFMGRID) as WIP_MSG_DEF_MGR_ID
, TRIM(OPERATION.WORKCENTERID) as WRK_CTR_ID
FROM  {Config.sourceDatabase}.OPERATION as OPERATION WHERE OPERATION._deleted_ =  'F'
  
 
""")
